TopicTitle: JSI Camera cant see other vessels

Articles.Content:
Hey fellow Kerbonauts,

I did not find a solution to my problem in other posts, so imma try my luck here.

I'm using the Aset Props Mod. (everything is installed properly and i love it)

But when i place an external mount camera right next to my docking port (want to use it as a docking camera obviously) and open the Camera Page on the MFD i can see the Space, the stars and everything but its like other vessels are insivible, even when im 2 meters away.

Does anyone know about the solution?
